What? And invasion? What did I missed? Milk? Guest? Maybe ... the guest is my baby?

Doctor A: "We can advance her pregnancy, this way she will produce more. Few girls have endured this procedure, but I believe she is special."

They put metal plates connected with wires near my belly. I need to get out of here. They start the procedure and I see how little by little my belly grows. I try to push my belly as if I could stop it, but it does not work.

What? Something is growing on my back ! It starts to light the inside of my belly ! What is happening to me?
What was growing on my shoulders it looks like they were wings. I have small white wings coming out of it. What am I supposed to be?

The light inside my belly is fading.

My belly and chest have grown remarkably.


One of the plates breaks and they take it to fix it in another room. This is my moment to escape.
14111111111.title: Go outside

141111111111.content:
Because I took so long getting myself up, the doctors come back before I can escape from the room.

Luckly, I managed hid behind a nearby closet.

I can see one scissor near me, I take it and I approach the doctor by the back slowly.

I take one of the doctors as a hostage. and threatened him with scissors. While I put my belly aside so it has space I ask them to return me to my initial state.

Doctor A (hostage): "I... I I I Can't help you, here we don't have the tools."

"Okey, let's go the place" - I answer.

Doctor B: "Stop. you will not get anything".

Abby: "Help me! I'm transforming in something not human, this baby it's changing me and I don't want it. Change me or I will nail these scissors."

Doctor A (Hostage): "Wait, wait, wait. Okey, I help you, we need go to portal. With portal you will travel to other world and know the people who have done this to you."


The doctors take me to portal. One big and orbed piece of metal. They touched something and portal started shine. I aprroached and... I appeared in a new place.

This place was a... new planet. I was im desert, i see the stars and a planet in front of me, but I need to move maybe they knew that I'm here.
I was between rocks and it was difficult move when something take my back and knocked down.

Was the same alient who paralyzed me in instalations.

- You arrived too away - he said. - I'm the same of your guest. One experiment mix with human and others, for this reason i can use your mind. I'm curious, you are experiencing something new, you have parts of the alien's race you have inside you, wings, blue hair, powers, and... i'm asking if i accelered the proces what more you can have.

He he put his hand on my belly and my belly started to grow and grow. When i could react i try to scape, i take a rock and hit him head. How i could i standed up and moved for the rocks, but was very dificult, my belly was too big and FUCK! baby was coming....
What i made?


"Ugh.. it's here.. agh... and I listened somebody, is the alien? i can't move.. AAAAH! The baby is out yet"
141111111111.title: Take the scissors

142.content: Over the next few days my boobs went from a B to a DD. Wearing comfy clothes in general was a hard thing and now I can't even wear a bra. In addition my belly was also growing faster than I had originally thought. My aunt asked how I got pregnant.
142.title: Bra-less!
